Html:
Hello,

I am trying to visualize a GSM network interference graph grouped by network cells,

To do it I've tried to create a graph that have as Parent Vertices my network cells and the network clients as Child Vertices each to it's current cell.

The problem is that the compound Layout  doesn't show the content of each cell (parent vertex) correctly (it draws it small and it doesn't feet to its content).

Is there a way to specify the layout algorithm of the child vertices and how to make the parent vertices feet to their content.

Finally excuse me for my English cause it's not my native and thank you.

NB:   GSM interference graphs are quit big (about a 1000 vertices and 6000 edges)
